About.title: About me
About.par2: I decided to pursue my passion for programming. I enrolled in software enginnering and continued to learn
About.par4: My favorite part of programming is the problem-solving aspect.
About.par5: I love the feeling of finally figuring out a solution to a problem.My core stack is
About.par6: I am also familiar with TypeScript with React and NextJS . I am always looking to learn new technologies. I am currently looking for a full-time position as a softwar developer.

items.title: End of Year Internship
items.description: I worked on a digital marketing platform for 6 months with Angular, Spring Boot, and Power BI. From there, I upskilled to full stack.

items.title: Engineering Internship
items.description: The design and implementation of an Appointment Management System, responsible for the full-stack development of the application. I continued after the internship to work on different tasks as a freelancer.

items.title: CorpComment
items.description: I worked as a full-stack developer on this startup project for 2 years. Users can give public feedback to companies.

items.title: rmtDev
items.description: Job board for remote developer jobs. I was the front-end developer. It has features like filtering, sorting and pagination.

items.title: Word Analytics
items.description: A public web app for quick analytics on text. It shows word count, character count and social media post limits.
